eventDetails.title: AKAI Code
eventDetails.description1: The first edition of the AKAI Code hackathon organized by AKAI - Akademickie Koło Aplikacji Internetowych - takes place at the Poznań University of Technology.
eventDetails.description2: The idea of an event is simple! You code an application related to the topic within 24 hours, and then the jury decides which team will win.
eventDetails.description3: There are three categories to compete in - Best Idea, Best Prototype and Best use of technology. What's the topic? You'll find out soon!
